title: Can we combine Riot point card values?
body: In the area I live in there are only 25$ cards. Is there a way I can use two 25s and get the value of a 50?

replies.body:
No, there's no way to combine two cards for the same RP value of a $50 card. You can always purchase $50 worth of RP inside the client itself since there aren't card locally available to you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
